website_summaries.verdict: If you're all about bling, this collar has plenty of colors, rhinestones, and customized options.
pros: Multiple base colors in the collar allow you to create a unique look
Charms and letters are offered in multiple colors, all covered in rhinestones
Can accommodate up to seven letters or six letters with a charm
cons: No room to add a personalized phone number
Loose charms could be choking hazard

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this from Amazon because the reviews were good. Similar collars on other websites said they broke after only a few days. Mine broke in 2 days on my "12 lb. house dog". Not worth the money. I have contacted the company about a return, but have not heard back after multiple attempts. The listing states not refunds because it is a personalized item, but I thought there would be an exception for poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Much more attractive than expected, not tacky at all!
customer_reviews.text: I love these collars, they are much better quality than I expected and don't look cheap, just very cut. I ordered medium even for for Pom, chihuahua and mini poodle, that way they're not too thin. They were pretty long, but all I need to do was add a hole, which didn't harm the lettering at all and cut off the end, which also did not fray at all. I've gotten them for all my dogs and am very pleased with them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KFreesin

customer_reviews.title: For the pet owners that like to be ‘extra’
customer_reviews.text: If you like to be ‘extra’ with your pets, this is the collar for you. It is good quality and so blingy and cute. I like that you can pick the color of the letters and symbols (heart, bone, paw, etc.). I got the hot pink collar with black letters and it’s adorable. Size seems to be accurate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kniccole1996

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted for our new dog. The quality of this collar is fantastic. Love all the color options available. We went with a black collar with red letters and a clear accent. It is gorgeous! I may even order another in different colors. The letters are pinched onto the band so they can't slide or tilt. The screws holding the name on are very tight and secure. See photos. Our dog is 12 lbs with an 11" neck and the size B collar we bought fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: CO Cartel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This collar is beautiful, heavy so my 10 week old shih tzu will have to get a bit bigger before he can wear it. I can't at this time review to how well it holds up to every day use. I can say that it is very nice and doesn't seem at all cheap. I only gave 4 stars cause it wasn't what I ordered. I ordered a dark blue collar with white letters. I happy with what I got so not such a big deal to me, but they should work on getting orders correct for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Omg! Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I ordered 4 and for the price of $4.99, you couldn't beat it! They are really well made and durable. I looooove them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clementine

customer_reviews.title: Pretty thick and heavy
customer_reviews.text: The collar is very thick and heavy and very durable. Would be absolutely awesome for a large dog. I ordered the medium size for my medium sized dog and it seems a little cumbersome for her. The name plate and the little add ons are great and I see where you would actually need this thickness and durability in order to add the bling. So yes, it is necessary to be as big as it is but I think next time I order a collar for my dog it will be scaled down a bit. Great price for a well made product but not great for smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: nytowl

customer_reviews.title: Quality all the way.
customer_reviews.text: I got one 7 years ago as a gift. It finally retired. When I saw this on Amazon I was so glad. Bought 2 one for each dog. It’s well made, last’s long. Very bling, it won’t fall apart. Probably the best bling collar you could purchase. Soooo happy with these. You will not be disappointed. AND, they are true to size. My dogs each have 10” necks. The XS is perfect. I was afraid they’d be too big. COULD NOT BE MORE HAPPY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great little buy for your pampered fur baby
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I have purchased several of these, pink, blue, blingy pink and now this one for Christmas for the new (rescue) addition to our pup family this year. I love them, and felt it was worth posting a photo, which I've NEVER done in a review before, but I hope it helps. They are affordable, durable, and fun. So far I have had no issues, and one of the 4 was worn continually for about 2 years by a Chihuahua, until I had to take it off her. Now she just wears on special occasions. I love to match with blingy paw print tags also found on Amazon for about 4.50 each.
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Best Collar Ever for my Cheer-Puppy!
customer_reviews.text: Leia is a big fan of the Dallas Cowboys- she cheers for our touchdowns and mopes in our losses. She’s my special canine friend, and a special part of our family. I loved that I could design her collar, and it truly came out perfect! I love her iridescent pink collar studded with her name in sparkly diamond-clear letters and capped each side with our favorite sapphire-like blue stars! Our puppy girl loves her collar, and I’m a happy wife that got to bling her dog, and my husband is a happy man with our Dallas Cowboys cheering home! 💙🏈⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Linda Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Unique & eye catching
customer_reviews.text: I loved this collar so much I bought 2! HOWEVER, I was confused at the instructions when typing in the name/“charm selection”. I only wanted a name & no charm and they put one on there anyway, then on the second order they misspelled the name I wanted, luckily it was easy enough to fix with a screwdriver & pair of pliers. It is so freaking cute I don’t even mind! I love the color options too! Will buy from again!
customer_reviews.author: m. panda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only took 1 week to receive and looks beautiful. Can’t believe the quality for the price I paid. The large fits my 70lb bluenose pitbull perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Aundrea0823

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Loved this collar when received. Easy ordering process & shipped as expected. Got numerous compliments. However it did not last long. Ordered may 31 and it just started falling apart. My boxer doesn’t wear her collar every day either. I rotate it with another collar throughout the week. I would give this product bette ratings if it was made of better quality. I want to reorder one but I am hesitant. Sucks too because I told everyone who asked, where to find it at on amazon. I guess you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan Swain

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this collar! It's so beautiful and unique. I would buy this again in the future. It is sturdy and quite easy to clean as long as you clean it often. Only downside I've seen so far is a gem had fallen out of a letter within the first week on having it. This collar is great for going out. Our active boxer wears a plain collar for at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jen R

customer_reviews.title: !Great product
customer_reviews.text: High quality, and doesn’t look cheap at all. Size C 13-16 fits both of our my miniature poodles perfectly/snug with plenty of room to grow into. Our dogs are 17 and 19 pounds. Only downside is it took a while before the order was filled. Still arrived in the time frame though.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Wilbert

customer_reviews.title: Take careful measurements
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this collar. The band is perfectly thick and wide. The glitter us super shimmery, isn't cheap and won't fall out at all. The rhinestones are really pretty quality also. For the price, it's suuuuuper shimmery and extra without looking obnoxious at all.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to order the correct size
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered the correct size, but the length & width of the collar is way too big for my dog. Wish I could replace it!
customer_reviews.author: LizN

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seriously impressed by the quality of this collar. It was only 5 bucks when I ordered it last week and it looks like the price has since gone up. I'd still buy it again at the new price. The charms and collar are very well done.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but doesnt stay
customer_reviews.text: The collars are beautiful but don't stay that way for long. If you get colored lettering it fades at different levels and starts to look strange. Also, there are lots of issues which they get the name wrong. Big plus is that they correct it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin Lakshmiratan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar! My pup, Crackle, looks so pretty wearing it. She hasn't been scratching at it, so it must be comfortable too. I do wish that I could have gotten one or two charms but her name is too long. It also took a long time to ship, which is understandable because it had to be customized first but I'm really impatient.
customer_reviews.author: bh

customer_reviews.title: I reccomend this dog collar.
customer_reviews.text: This personalized collar is durable and sturdy. My last one I purchased lasted more than 6 years through out all my dogs rough play. I never lost a rhinestone out of the name or charms. I recommend this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic#1

customer_reviews.title: STAR of the doggie park
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased two of these fabulous necklaces for my pup. They’re good quality even when she is pulling on the leash. Sizing is accurate, rhinestones stay in place and they are gorgeous. I’ve never seen another dog with one that’s similar. You can’t beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Holtz

customer_reviews.title: Slightly bigger than description
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful, however even when I followed the size chart the collar was a little big. It still works but next time I know to order a size down. The size description is a little off.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Horan Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice Personalized Collar
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this collar. The fasteners for the personalized name plate was sturdy and extra fasteners are included with the purchase. Definitely a good company to buy from.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but was a little late, ended up getting a second anyway.
customer_reviews.text: Update bought a second, worth it. I really liked the idea of having a custom colorful collar for my dog and I can’t express how pleased I am with the outcome. I do wish you had green and orange crystal letters, but I understand cost and not wanted to buy or make things not likely to be bought. The only difficulty encountered was a delayed delivery and I can’t say what went wrong there. Overall I’m really happy with the result.
customer_reviews.author: smile50

customer_reviews.title: Too small... But cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute collar. But it barely fits. My dogs neck is 11 in. I ordered for that size and it only closes in first hole and is not loose. Will have to replace soon .
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Lovely just beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is so lovely just out of this world If you were to see it you would think I paid so much more You will love it I promise I never say that but it blew me away
customer_reviews.author: cyntia A.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: The color was beautiful but not much direction on the sizes so I order this collar in a medium way to big was force to cute it . Did care for that so Ivam reordering innsmaller size
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore these collars. I have two 7lbs yorkies. I’m giving 4 stars only because of the size. I wish these came in XS. The small I purchased was rather big. I put an extra hole in them so they fit more snug. Great purchase for the price! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this collar!!! It's so pretty!!! It's absolutely the price & shipping time. Its actually very cheap on the price & worth more than they charge especially since you can customize it. I've addwd pictures so you can see it on my short haired Chihuahua. Be sure ro measure your dogs neck before ordering so you can get the correct size!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Looks great. I got The silver with blue lettering. Fast shipping and good quality. I have A Great Dane and got a Large and fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Milla

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this collar, in pink with silver lettering, just for fun. I thought it would look really tacky, but it's actually pretty nice. It holds up fine and can be cleaned with towel.
customer_reviews.author: Turdytree

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how quickly this arrived and the wonderful quality it has. You would expect less for the price, I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Teri L. Hoben

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty bling collar
customer_reviews.text: It’s really pretty bling collar! I bought extra clips just Incase the name tag popped off from the dog scratching or wear. Not to much bling, it’s tasteful.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F

customer_reviews.title: High-quality product that is super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This product is Just Uber cool! It looks way better in person then even in the pictures and does not look cheap. I could not be more pleased with my purchase. I ordered two collars for my Dachshunds and as impossible it is it is, they are even cuter now!
customer_reviews.author: Camillionbux!

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality w/BLING
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today and it appears to be a good quality collar. The personalization is exactly what we ordered. Our Cheek (Pekingnese / Chihuahua mix) will be BLINGING in style!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.  Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Looks great on my dog. Had another collar like this but the people at work didn't notice it to much. Hopefully with the extra sparkle they will notice the pick so the question of is the dog a boy or girl won't be asked every day. Got it before the deadline they gave me
customer_reviews.author: Angela Barr

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty....but broke
customer_reviews.text: This collar was so pretty, i loved it for my girl. I wished it would have been maybe thicker and wider. Unfortunately it broke about two weeks after we got it. Not durable enough for a pit.
customer_reviews.author: Celissa Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the quality and heftiness of this collar. My dog is only 12 lbs so even tho it is hefty it still is not too much for a smaller dog. I got the light blue with light pink lettering. It's sweet.
customer_reviews.author: ElkRam

customer_reviews.title: Looks great lots of sparkle
customer_reviews.text: Fits great looks great seems to be good quality my dog loves her bling but goes through lots of collars for some reason so I hope this one last a while
customer_reviews.author: Alan Parker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love these collars. I ordered one and the leather had a flaw in it and they replaced it for me. And I just love the color so much. They are so beautiful
customer_reviews.author: nichole phillips

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! I got my puppie's name and a star on pink bling! It is so fancy and beautiful! Love this collar!
customer_reviews.author: CDH

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Collar for the cutest puppy!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly as long as I can purchase them I will never buy another collar! Not only is it absolutely adorable, but it is so durable. The letters are nice and thick. Haven’t lost one gem. Seriously I ant say one negative thing about these! Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Collar
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the largest one for my golden retriever. I LOVE the bling! Very pretty collar. It does fit her but it's on the last hole. I wish it came in larger sizes and I would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Sparkley
customer_reviews.text: Got the pink one for my female dog. Big hit at the dog park. It's well made especially at the price. Will buy it in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Primozic

customer_reviews.title: Love It, Will Be Buying More In The Future !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this customized collar a few months ago just forgot to drop a review but here I am now . This collar is so beautiful and I get a lot of compliments on the collar every time she wears it! The collar is super cute and the diamonds have not fallen out with regular wear for the 4 months I’ve had it ! I will totally be buying more as I got a new puppy & my mother’s dog would look great in this collar as well ! 10/10 Recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Cuter than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: After I ordered this I started wishing I ordered the letters/pictures in different colors, but it was too late. I finally received the item and I was glad I couldnt change it. It was PERFECT! So cute, and fit my baby girl perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and well made. I will definitely be buying another when she grows out of this one. Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amd

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these collars, very cute and last for a good amount of time. I've ordered them multiple times. I have two dogs so they each have one with their names on it, the collars in the pics I've had for about 6 months already and still intact and no stones missing!
customer_reviews.author: Vtown

customer_reviews.title: missing part
customer_reviews.text: collar with the name was in place .. however there was no D ring to put a leash or tags and i messaged seller and they won't reply back .. waste of money , its a collar for looks only but I have to have a secondary collar to take dog for a walk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This collar was so worth the money. Nice and blingy for 1/4 the price of a typical customized collar. Super durable. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: cheermom33

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar
customer_reviews.text: These callers run a little large from what the images show. Not ideal for a small puppy and toy size dog. Thats the only reason I gave it four starts. The collars and metal letter are very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Love it and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Super Bling! What a great price for such a fancy collar. I paid much more at a dog event for my other dog's collar--love this one more! WIll be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! THANK YOU SO MUCH! CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS ALSO A GREAT HELP! JUST CONTACT THEM AND THEY WILL ADDRESS ANY ISSUE YOU MIGHT HAVE.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Bling dog collar
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick dog collar even for a big dog Nice and shiny and glittery for girls dog
customer_reviews.author: rebecca Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Nicer in person. It is very sparkly and the buckle is even sparkly too. My dog was only 5 lbs when I got this for her and it wasn’t too heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this collar! It is adorable. Very sturdy and really nice quality! Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schneiderman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My girls, Yorkie toys, look so beautiful wearing these collars. I would have liked a different color but pink was the only color left.
customer_reviews.author: MZN

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: She looks great in it, thank you so much. My big girl, looks pretty in her new collar.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: SUPER Cute, but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So adorable, but didn't last very long. Cracking on the collar and the ring broke off when walking our dog. So cute though. It wasn't very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Excellent color, excellent material. Love it! Lourdes
customer_reviews.author: María de Lourdes A. De Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute collars for my babies kind of stuff at first but will soften up some.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Poo

customer_reviews.title: My yorkie looks so adorable in her new collar...love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this last week and I rarely write reviews but I absolutely love this! It is so cute, personalized and seems to be really well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesi37

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited when we came across these, only to have to strap be way too long and just hang (it looks ridiculous) and have her letters to her name fall off. I am so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Bought for a friend who wears them as chokers and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, but very stiff.
customer_reviews.text: Collar is very pretty, but is very stiff causing an irritation on my dog’s neck.
customer_reviews.author: vpatton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time i purchase this collar and im in love. Loved the quality And work on the collar. i also got in a small size i believe is the 10-12in for my chihuahua.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle27

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My babies looooove their collars! The light pink is perfect. And there’s no fading or pieces that come off. Will order again.... next pet that is. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered similar collars for twice the price years ago, and had to get new ones when I found these. They are exactly how I designed, and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: Cute but the large was a little small for our Olde English Bulldog.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Eacret

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my cockapoo. Very nice quality. Very nice value.
customer_reviews.author: Julie-Loree Stone

customer_reviews.title: They were even better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It was well made much prettier than the picture. The puppies loved them, everyone comments on how pretty they are. Will definitely buy again ir as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rclark

customer_reviews.title: Quality products for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have three, one for each of my dogs. They last well, stones stay incredibly well and the colors are bright. Well worth the price and I will only buy from this vendor moving forward due to how much I love the product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Sparkling Dog Collar is so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dog Pepper. She apparently thought it was food because she ate it before she got to wear it. This is a purple collar with a hot pink crown and hot pink letters. It did have a chemical smell to it at first but it dissipated within a day or so. I am about to place another order for one I liked it so much!
customer_reviews.author: S. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This collar is very pretty! I love it! It looked too big when I pulled it out of the package, but when I put it on my fur baby it fit her perfectly! Seems like it is pretty durable. Came sooner that expected date. Will be ordering more for my other fur children! Lol 😜
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I love these! I keep coming back for more!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these collars for my fur child as well as all of my friend's fur babies! LOVE the black with clear rhinestone look!
customer_reviews.author: DomesticGoddess💋

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and true to size. Absolutely love. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: beth toporek

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this more than affordable find! Love how great it turned out!
customer_reviews.author: AussieLover

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my dog and for my friends dogs as well for Valentine's day. So cute, well made and different. Everyone compliments and a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Gelsie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful collar
customer_reviews.text: This collar is simply gorgeous!!!!!!! Amazing value and beautiful collar
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Collins

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: I admired a similar collar my friend got for her dogs and ordered one for our pupper. It arrived as ordered and is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Desiderata28

customer_reviews.title: SO BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: SO BEAUTIFUL, IT CAME FAST AND WAS EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED.
customer_reviews.author: NORMA LOUIS

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Nylah loves it, have to order another one because she is a big girl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This collar is so cute! My pupper loves it and it arrived very quickly. It is well made and seems like it will last for a long time. The rhinestones are good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Totally cute and well made! Even more sparkly than the picture! Sizing is accurate. Had it for a month now and it’s still in like new shape!
customer_reviews.author: kathy russell

customer_reviews.title: letter size
customer_reviews.text: it’s cute but the letters are smaller than picture which was a bummer
customer_reviews.author: Devon Fedorova

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Cutest collar ever! Pup loves it. I love that its can grow with her. One rhinestone did fallout in less than a week of having it but it's too cute. She get tons of compliments. Shipping was quite and seller responds quickly
customer_reviews.author: Robert Villao

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great material , didn't cause any irritation for my Pup's neck.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful collar!
customer_reviews.text: I love the collar we received! We ordered the purple color with clear rhinestones and let me tell you, it's stunning! I love it and definitely recommed!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous collar
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo cute. My dog looks great wearing it and the customization didn't take long at all. The sparkly coating my not last, but for the price, whatev.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Bling bling
customer_reviews.text: So cute a little thick but i got a bigger size so i can see the names clearly. Beautiful and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: witchie

customer_reviews.title: Great overall !
customer_reviews.text: Super pretty and fit my dog pretty well ! I had to add an extra hole , but that was to be expected for my 11 week old , 4 pound silky Terrier 💕 overall I am very happy with this product and it was well worth the money and the wait.
customer_reviews.author: katelynd camp

customer_reviews.title: GREAT colors for collars and rhinestones!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors of the collars and the rhinestones are beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Donisi

customer_reviews.title: II Love this Company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of these collars Very nice .I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Buyer

customer_reviews.text: Great customized collar... our daughters dog has been wearing it for a month and it still look new.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy mullins

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s freaken beautiful. Everything seems really sturdy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! It look beautiful on our Mini Goldendoodle. Great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat this price!
customer_reviews.text: I still can’t believe how great the quality of this collar is especially for the price, I love it, it turned out way better then I expected. I have a 5lb chihuahua and the small fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Corrales

customer_reviews.title: Yes, the price is real!
customer_reviews.text: Have written maybe 2 reviews in my life, this one deserved it. Great quality, great look, would buy 10 times over.
customer_reviews.author: Katlin

customer_reviews.title: Bling collar
customer_reviews.text: It is super cute but she has already lost 3-4 stones out the collar.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

product_meta.title: Bling Stuff For Fun, Personalized Customized PU Leather Glitter Rhinestone Bling Name Collar for Dogs & Puppies
product_meta.description: ATTENTION TO Medium and Large size dogs - If your dog pulls on a lead often or/and strong, please use this collar for accessory purpose only, Collar is not made with real leather, It's PU leather which is weaker then real a leather,
feature_bullets: Custom Personalized Rhinestone Bling Dog Name Glitter Collar - Very Fancy and Sparkly Dog Collars!!
8 Color of 10mm Letters and 8 Color of 10mm Charms (pink, hot pink, clear, red, deep purple, blue, black, light blue), 9 Kind of Charms(crown, heart, paw, flower, skull, star, USA flag, dog and bone)
Collar Width: size A: 0.5", size B: 0.70", size C: 1", size D: 1"
Up to 6 letters w/ one charm, or 7 letters with no charm, or 4 letters w/ 2 charms
PLEASE NOTE: when 2bone charms are requested, most of the time, they won't fit on the collar slider, We will change to one paw and one bone charm instead of 2 bone charms
